attributes.action: Dispense with vicarious liability where people do not follow established rules.
attributes.additional_details: Corporate managers/agents of corporations such as cash-strapped NHS, acting in the course of their employment, who engage in malicious acts and vendetta against staff for whistleblowing in the interest of patient safety, must be made to personally bear the cost of litigation or other fees that arise as a result of employment related matters, if found to act outside established corporate protocols or guidelines. See http://www.mirror.co.uk/news/uk-news/top-hospital-consultant-claims-nhs-10852876
attributes.background: There are many reported cases of misuse of tax payers money, by managers particularly in the NHS. Whilst hiding under the cloak of vicarious liability, these managers resort to bullying, intimidation, harrassment and dismissal of staff who raise legitimate concerns about patient safety. This is rife
